H3.text: Because of the large distance between objects in space, the light year is often used to describe distances between objects in the universe.

A4.text: light-years are also popularly used to gauge the expanses of interstellar and intergalactic space.

A5.text: Distances to objects such as quasars and the Sloan Great Wall run into the billions of light-years.
